items.content_html: A lightweight helper library for building consistent settings UIs in Obsidian plugins.
items.title: dariuszkanicki/obsidian-settings-ui: A lightweight helper library for building consistent settings UIs in Obsidian plugins.

items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
items.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.
items.title: thinakaranmanokaran/Package-Helper: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

items.content_html: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.
items.title: PedroFake02/better-link: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.

items.content_html: A lightweight, accessible component library providing essential UI building blocks for modern web applications.
items.title: muhammadhamzakhan22/element-essentials: A lightweight, accessible component library providing essential UI building blocks for modern web applications.

items.content_html: A lightweight Todo API in NestJS illustrating Clean Architecture: domain entities + value objects in a core layer, use-case services as the application ring, and adapters—REST controllers & Prisma persistence—on the outer ring. A concise, self-contained demo for Clean-Arch practice.
items.title: Rbourree/NEST-CleanArchitecture: A lightweight Todo API in NestJS illustrating Clean Architecture: domain entities + value objects in a core layer, use-case services as the application ring, and adapters—REST controllers & Prisma persistence—on the outer ring. A concise, self-contained demo for Clean-Arch practice.

items.content_html: Streamline Tasks. Empower Teams. OrbitPlan is a lightweight, intuitive application designed for seamless task management and employee coordination. Whether you're organizing workflows or managing team performance, OrbitPlan helps you stay productive and aligned. Built for teams that value clarity, efficiency, and simplicity.
items.title: NandaKishore-NP/OrbitPlan: Streamline Tasks. Empower Teams. OrbitPlan is a lightweight, intuitive application designed for seamless task management and employee coordination. Whether you're organizing workflows or managing team performance, OrbitPlan helps you stay productive and aligned. Built for teams that value clarity, efficiency, and simplicity.

items.content_html: ⚡ JavaScript-aware crawler for security researchers and bug bounty hunters. Extract hidden endpoints and internal subdomains through static and semantic analysis of JS files. Lightweight. Fast. Sneaky.

items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.

items.content_html: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.

items.content_html: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.

items.content_html: Fluentity is a lightweight and flexible library for TypeScript/JavaScript applications to consume RESTFul API using models. It's inspired by Active Record and Laravel Eloquent. It provides a simple and intuitive way to interact with your API endpoints while maintaining type safety and following object-oriented principles.
items.title: cedricpierre/fluentity-core: Fluentity is a lightweight and flexible library for TypeScript/JavaScript applications to consume RESTFul API using models. It's inspired by Active Record and Laravel Eloquent. It provides a simple and intuitive way to interact with your API endpoints while maintaining type safety and following object-oriented principles.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: This is a Node.js-based application built with JavaScript to provide fast, scalable, and efficient backend services. It utilizes an event-driven, non-blocking I/O model, making it lightweight and ideal for real-time applications.
